title: test_witless_runner.test_asyncio_forked: random fails
body:
Previous encounters:
- https://github.com/datalad/datalad/pull/5010#issuecomment-803184162 (on NFS)
- https://github.com/datalad/datalad/pull/5540#issuecomment-811547243 (in heavy logging run)

current master (NFS):
```
======================================================================
FAIL: datalad.tests.test_witless_runner.test_asyncio_forked
----------------------------------------------------------------------
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/tmp/dl-miniconda-ye_x_j8f/lib/python3.8/site-packages/nose/case.py", line 198, in runTest
    self.test(*self.arg)
  File "/tmp/dl-miniconda-ye_x_j8f/lib/python3.8/site-packages/datalad/tests/utils.py", line 757, in _wrap_with_tempfile
    return t(*(arg + (filename,)), **kw)
  File "/tmp/dl-miniconda-ye_x_j8f/lib/python3.8/site-packages/datalad/tests/test_witless_runner.py", line 221, in test_asyncio_forked
    raise AssertionError("Child process did not create a file we expected!")
AssertionError: Child process did not create a file we expected!
```
